notes: elision of di before vowel; idiomatic 'in summer'
example_sentence_english: In summer we go to the seaside.
Recent summers have been very hot.

example_sentence_italian: Le estati in città sono afose.
example_sentence_english: Summers in the city are muggy.
I remember the colors of summer.
It has been closed since last summer.

example_sentence_italian: Nell'estate del 2003 ha fatto molto caldo.
example_sentence_english: In the summer of 2003 it was very hot.
I read a book about summer.

example_sentence_italian: Ho imparato molto dalle estati passate.
example_sentence_english: I learned a lot from past summers.

example_sentence_italian: Nelle estati italiane bevo molta acqua.
example_sentence_english: In Italian summers I drink a lot of water.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono studi sulle estati più calde.
example_sentence_english: There are studies about the hottest summers.

example_sentence_italian: Con le estati recenti il caldo è aumentato.
example_sentence_english: With recent summers the heat has increased.
